about_the_game: The soundtrack to The Struggles Of Stefan is the second album under Clint Decker's moniker Pharos Fables and is the third in his collection of overall solo efforts. The tracks never settle with one feel throughout the life of the record, and they move from happiness to mystery, to anxiety, rage, and loneliness, but the soundtrack as a whole provides a glimmer of longing and hope for the listener.
detailed_description: The soundtrack to The Struggles Of Stefan is the second album under Clint Decker's moniker Pharos Fables and is the third in his collection of overall solo efforts. The tracks never settle with one feel throughout the life of the record, and they move from happiness to mystery, to anxiety, rage, and loneliness, but the soundtrack as a whole provides a glimmer of longing and hope for the listener.
name: The Struggles Of Stefan Official Soundtrack
short_description: The Struggles Of Stefan Official Soundtrack from Clint Decker touches a vast amount of genres from choral to ambient to cinematic.
